lead_paragraph: Four of the candidates for president of FIFA are heading to Qatar for meetings on Saturday, with one of them, the South African Tokyo Sexwale, saying, “The time for alliances is coming.”
snippet: Four of the candidates for president of FIFA are heading to Qatar for meetings on Saturday, with one of them, the South African Tokyo Sexwale, saying, “The time for alliances is coming.”
abstract: Four candidates for FIFA presidency are traveling to Qatar to meet with Asian member assocations of FIFA; other soccer news noted.
